00003 #ifndef DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN
00004 // A macro to disallow the copy constructor and operator= functions
00005 // This should be used in the private: declarations for a class
00006 #define DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(TypeName) \
00007   TypeName(const TypeName&);               \
00008   void operator=(const TypeName&);
00009 #endif  // DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN
